entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 06 January 2023
